title: Upload Post Video
description: Upload a video file for a post (supports MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI, MKV)
notes: Allowed formats: MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI, MKV
Video status starts as 'pending' - may need processing before ready
Recommended to use MP4 for maximum compatibility
Video processing status can be 'pending', 'processing', 'ready', or 'failed'
